short_summary: The Emergency Watch and Response Centre (EWRC) is Global Affairs Canada’s 24/7 365 Day communication hub that provides consular services to Canadian citizens in need of routine or emergency assistance outside of Canada.
description:
The contract period will be from contract award date until one (1) year later plus four (4) one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract. \n
The online platform must have capability to deploy artificial intelligence / machine learning tools, such as chat bots, that integrate with all communication channels. \n
Chat bots, as well as any client facing interface within the control of the vendor, must be available in English and French. \n
There is a security requirement associated with this solicitation. \n
